item.title: How Google Cloud is using devops in Monitoring and Observability?
item.description: In the rapidly evolving world of cloud computing, the need for efficiency, speed, and reliability has never been greater. To address these needs, many companies have embraced DevOps, a set of practices that combine development and operations teams to streamline the entire software delivery lifecycle. But while DevOps principles are critical to improving collaboration and accelerating development, they also demand effective tools for monitoring and observability to ensure the health and performance of applications at all stages.
